name: Ghost!Flash!Bye~
description:
After losing a bet with your friends - you now have to go in to the creepy old mansion!

Clear the mansion of all the spookies as soon as you can! Race for the fastest time!

Controls:

Movement is automatic - you only need to change directions!

WASD / ←↑→↓ - Change direction

SPACE - Recharge flashlight

You win when the progress bar at the top of the screen is filled up!

Collect light orbs to recharge your flashlight in a zip (when charge is less than 50%)!

Collect hearts to increase your health points!

Made in ~9 hours, so expect some bugs.
